body: Yet another futadom/feminization douji where the dude becomes a slave to dick. *sigh* Doujis like this are a dime a dozen and I have no likes for such. At least make the male fuck the futa once. Too many artists out there just wanna be dommed by a Futa and become a dumpster, SMH. 0/10

@eman castaneda Futanari are hermaphrodites, having both a penis and a vagina (balls are optional; also have boobs). If they don’t have both sets of genitals they are not and can not be futanari. Without a vagina, they are dickgirls or shemales or newhalfs or trannies or whatever, and are often featured in extremely degenerate feminization doujins and shit like this dickgirl on male doujin; this specific one leaves the presence of a vagina ambiguous, but I would never put removing the vagina past any of these artists that draw males getting pegged. This shit is peak faggotry, male on male is completely fine, but when you get this tranny-ish shit it’s just disgusting.
I think futanari are just shemales with big boobies
